original_text: At that time men were appointed to be in charge of the storerooms for the contributions, firstfruits and tithes. From the fields around the towns they were to bring into the storerooms the portions required by the Law for the priests and the Levites, for Judah was pleased with the ministering priests and Levites.
korean_text: 그 날에 사람을 세워 곳간을 맡기고 제사장들과 레위 사람들에게 돌릴 것 곧 율법에 정한 대로 거제물과 처음 익은 것과 십일조를 모든 성읍 밭에서 거두어 이 곳간에 쌓게 하였노니 이는 유다 사람이 섬기는 제사장들과 레위 사람들로 말미암아 즐거워하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: At that time men were appointed
to be in charge of the storerooms
for the contributions, firstfruits and tithes
From the fields around the towns
they were to bring into the storerooms
the portions required by the Law
for the priests and the Levites
with the ministering priests and Levites
